long_description: FishSeeUV Panther Martin 6-Pack. These lures are truly eye-popping the way humans see them, but when you put them under a black light, you will truly be amazed at the way the UV colors and fluorescent orange bead stand out and call out to passing fish. Particularly effective on cloudy days or in murky or muddy waters. These lures are deadly on trout, bass, kokanee, salmon, steelhead and many other species. Contains 6 eye-popping patterns in sizes 2 & 4.
google_categorization: Sporting Goods > Outdoor Recreation > Fishing > Fishing Lures
